title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Invitation to presentation of Q3 2014 results

content.rendered:
21 October 2014 – Aqualis ASA (OSE: AQUA) will release its third quarter 2014 results on Wednesday 29 October 2014.

The results will be presented by Aqualis’ CEO David Wells and CFO Christian Opsahl at 09:30 CET at Hotel Continental (Stortingsgata 24-26 Oslo, Norway). Following the presentation there will be a Q&A session. The presentation will be held in English.

The quarterly report and the presentation materials will be available on the Company website and on www.newsweb.no.

ENDS

For further information, please contact:

Investors:
Christian Opsahl
CFO
Tel: +47 901 101 53
Email: christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA : Third quarter results 2014
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 29 October 2014 - Marine and offshore engineering consultancy group Aqualis ASA (Aqualis) reported revenues of USD 10.7 million in the third quarter 2014. Adjusted EBIT was USD 0.3 million. Order backlog stood at USD 22 million at the end of the third quarter. "We continue our geographical expansion as well as growth…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA : Presentation at Pareto Securities Oil & Offshore Conference 2014
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, 10 September 2014 Aqualis ASA (OSE: AQUA) will today at 17:00 CET present the company at the Pareto Oil & Offshore Conference in Oslo. The presentation is attached to this stock exchange notice, and it will also be published on the company's website (www.aqualisbraemar.com). Pareto Conference 2014 Aqualis ASA…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Aqualis ASA: Q2 2015 financial results
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: 26 August 2015 - Marine and offshore engineering consultancy group Aqualis ASA (Aqualis) reported revenues of USD 11.4 million in the second quarter of 2015, a 65 % increase from the corresponding quarter in 2014. The group continues its rapid expansion plan with two new office openings in the quarter.…

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Oslo, 20 August 2014 Reference is made to press release from Aqualis ASA (OSE: WEIFA) 19 Aug 2014 regarding the company changing name to Weifa ASA, and such name change being registered in the Norwegian Register of Business Enterprises. After this transaction Bjørn Håvard Brænden, and related parties, hold 292'331 shares in Aqualis. ***** Contact:…
